The board also decided to focus on renaming schools instead of reopening them. So, here's some free speech for the comm-ish and her fellow recallees, you suck. Your arrogance and incompetence or hurting kids and parents aren't going to take it anymore. I always thought like there's no way you can put you, can put that thing together, it's impossible. But what happens is an outline does everything, right?
